TopicTitle: JoolTube: KSP Enhanced Edition on PS4!

Articles.Content:
Here you will know what #KSP is and how it plays. Consider it a first look for total newbies!

By GrunfWorks

Wait.... Its on ps4???

   wow... its grown

I got the Enhanced edition a few days ago, very pleased with it.

Still has a few bugs, but it is a vast improvement. I'm still trying to get the new control scheme memorized.

Is there any sort of reference guide for those of us PS4 console Kerbals who have no experience with the Kerbal Radio Network? I haven't gotten very far in the Career mode, so I don't have the most of the comm net unlocked. My question is this, if I put a Satellite with a couple high-gain antenna's and a couple normal antennas in orbit around the mun, will the high gain signal be available to a lander that only has regular antenna?

Do not get this on console yet. Check the bugtracker and see the game breaking problems they are having. https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/projects/ksp/issues?utf8=✓&set_filter=1&f[]=status_id&op[status_id]=o&f[]=cf_8&op[cf_8]=%3D&v[cf_8][]=XBoxOne&f[]=&c[]=tracker&c[]=priority&c[]=status&c[]=cf_7&c[]=cf_8&c[]=subject&c[]=assigned_to&c[]=updated_on&c[]=done_ratio&c[]=fixed_version&group_by=&t[]=

This is a link for Xbox1. You can navigate to PS4 issues from there.

Edited February 7, 2018 by Joessep Kerman
